title: Worlds 2015 to be held in Europe

replies.body: When will it be held in Australia :-:
Bring it to Aus!
PLS RITO AUSTRALIA

there is no point bringing it to australia if nobody from oce servers would be participating for it. They should have the wildcard tournament before they decide where the venue is so that if oce gets in,there is a reason to make australia where the venue is.
Definitely should be held in Aus!
but Australia is da best{{summoner:31}}
some people would be suprised to see how big the Aus/oce community is.

Also it is unlikely to draw significant crowds if held in a comparatively underpopulated country like Australia. Not many people would fly over to Australia from the US/Europe/Asia due to costs and the Esports scene is teensy compared to the larger countries. If held in America, Asia or Europe it is easier for the majority of the league of legends community to access it.

TL;DR at the current point in time, it would be economically unviable to hold the LCS in Australia.

There is basically only one way for Australia to even make it through to worlds which is the wildcard tournament where they have to vs very strong foes from different countries. If there was as many ways for Australia to enter worlds as there is in America and Europe, then we would see the Chiefs or Immunity in worlds.

It should be held In Australia but we must consider that Australia has one of the slowest internet in the world, nobody from NA/EU or other parts of the world would not see Australia as a big gaming scene and the OCE server is still small and none of the OCE teams have made it to Worlds.
I agree, no one will come here to watch it. Definitely not a Seoul sized crowd.
internet is to slow to bring to australia trust me our internet is 3rd world
True, they'd probably lag halfway through the matches before the power cuts off
The competitions are LAN so the internet would not make a difference for them, it's just the teams would not be able to practice as well.
who cares Australia deserves it as much as any
Yeah just give them a fair heads up about our beautiful wildlife with this instructional video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eNEeq5qGh8I
That would be awesome, I would attend for sure
Aussie and NZ
NEVER u Australian so fuking noobs i have played there  unlivable  !!!
How can you justify the whole population of Australia suck at LoL.. From my experience in league there is always someone better than you out there!
I agree, but who is better than the best O.O
Koreans
So how many games have you played on oce?
about 50 the worst server in league of legends is OCE
Ples rito hold it in aus so that no one thinks the oce server is a joke anymore <3

Even though we do not have the best conditions here in Australia I believe that holding Worlds could be a great step for League of Legends. I believe that if we were assigned to hold such an event maybe internet connection may start to change/improve after being inspired by what worlds is and how many people follow it. Also imagine the hype it would bring to a country who's older population has generally never heard of eSports. Maybe not for Season 6 but even Season 7 when OCE starts to grow in skill and fans then this may be the perfect move for Riot to make ;)
